mapper.insert: insert into file_room values(#{user_id}, sysdate, #{file_room_name}, (SELECT nvl(MAX(TO_NUMBER(file_room_no)),0)+1 FROM file_room), #{file_room_ext}, #{file_room_rename}, #{file_room_cutname}, #{collabo_no})
mapper.select: select count(*) from file_room where collabo_no = #{param2} and file_room_name = #{param1}
select file_room_name from file_room where collabo_no = #{collabo_no} and file_room_rename = #{file_room_rename}

select * from (select rownum num, n.* from (select * from file_room where collabo_no = #{param2} order by file_room_no desc) n) where num between 1 + (#{param1} - 1) * 12 and 12 + (#{param1} - 1) * 12
mapper.delete: delete file_room where collabo_no = #{collabo_no} and file_room_rename = #{file_room_rename}
mapper.select: select count(*) from file_room where collabo_no = #{collabo_no}

select * from (select rownum num, n.* from (select * from file_room where collabo_no = #{param3} and file_room_name like '%'||#{param1}||'%' order by file_room_no desc) n) where num between 1 + (#{param2} - 1) * 12 and 12 + (#{param2} - 1) * 12
select count(*) from file_room where collabo_no = #{param2} and file_room_name like '%'||#{param1}||'%'

select * from (select rownum num, n.* from (select * from file_room where collabo_no = #{param3} and to_char(file_room_date) like to_date(nvl(#{param1}, sysdate),'YY/MM/DD') order by file_room_no desc) n) where num between 1 + (#{param2} - 1) * 12 and 12 + (#{param2} - 1) * 12
select count(*) from file_room where collabo_no = #{param2} and to_char(file_room_date) like to_date(nvl(#{param1}, sysdate),'YY/MM/DD')
